screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .17t file in BHOK IT Consulting StudioTax 2017
screenshot.caption: 17T file open in BHOK IT Consulting StudioTax 2017

description: When you save your tax return in StudioTax 2017, the 17T file is created to save your progress. It is the main file type used by the 2017 version of StudioTax and is primarily used for three purposes:

Tax return file extensions used by StudioTax reflect the year of the tax data they contain. Tax returns for the 2016 year use the .16t extension, returns for the 2015 year use the .15t extension, and so on.
